flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday he made 32/2=<<32/2=61>>61 cookies
On Wednesday he made 61*3=<<61*3=183>>183 cookies
Before his brother ate some he had 32+61+183=<<32+61+183=276>>276 cookies
After his brother ate some he had 276-4=<<276-4=272>>272 cookies.
#### 272

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
